item.title: Google Cloud Vision API
item.description: Obsolete Modules Error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named ‘google.cloud’ pip install --upgrade google-cloud-speech Error: ImportError: cannot import name ‘vision’ from ‘google.cloud’ (unknown location) pip install --upgrade setuptools pip wheel pip install google-cloud-vision Re-Auth https://cloud.google.com/vision/docs/setup#auth Note that you may want to check your $PATH before you start.

item.title: Finance Figures Open APIs
item.description: cninfo API: http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/#/myApi Basic info: http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/sysapi/p_sysapi1018?scode=002055 method = post Income statment overview : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2332?scode=002055&sdate=20190930&edate=20190930&type=071001 method = post Cash flow : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2333?scode=002055&sdate=20190331&edate=20190331&type=071001 method = post Indicators : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2303?scode=002055&rdate=20190930&type=071001 method = post Wind visualization: https://wx.wind.com.cn/reactweb/YearReport/index.html?from=singlemessage#/report?windCode=002055.SZ&typeCode=0
